body_html: @yinghai A question on the code structure "caffe2/contrib": is there any process that promotes the contributed module as the root module? I am asking because I noticed that the old mkl-ml operators are placed at root under "caffe2/mkl" which may confuse the users in the future since we expect the new MKL-DNN operators would gradually replace the old mkl-ml operators.

body: @yinghai A question on the code structure "caffe2/contrib": is there any process that promotes the contributed module as the root module? I am asking because I noticed that the old mkl-ml operators are placed at root under "caffe2/mkl" which may confuse the users in the future since we expect the new MKL-DNN operators would gradually replace the old mkl-ml operators.
